equation:
\begin{equation}\label{metric}
ds^2 = -n^2(t,y,z) dt^2 + a^2(t,y,z) d\Sigma_{k} ^2 + b^2(t,y,z)
dy^2 + c^2(t,y,z) dz^2 \, ,
\

\begin{equation}\label{rel}
g_{MN} \tilde n^M \tilde n^N =1 \quad , \quad g_{MN} \tilde n^M u^N =0
\, ,
\

\begin{equation}\label{dtdtau}
d\tau = n(t,{\cal R}(t)) \sqrt{ 1- {{c^2(t,{\cal R}(t))}\over
{n^2(t,{\cal R}(t))} } \dot {\cal R}^2}\, dt \equiv n \gamma^{-1} dt \, .
\

\begin{equation}\label{fluctuation}
{{\ddot{\delta{\cal R}}}\over h^2} + \left( m_h ^2 + (3+ 4 \, v_s ^2)
  m_a ^2 \right) \delta{\cal R} = 0 \, ,
\

\begin{equation}\label{fluc}
{{\ddot{\delta{\cal R}}}\over h^2} + \left\{ {{{1
  \over l^2} -6 {M \over {\bar{\cal R}^5}}} \over {k + {{\bar{\cal
  R}^2}\over l^2} - {M \over {\bar{\cal R}^3}}}} - (7+8\omega)
  (3+4\omega) {{\kappa_{(6)} ^4} \over {64}} \bar\rho ^2 \right\}
  \delta{\cal R} =0 \, .
\
